system.description: in one Action, Mark 1 Stress per ICE on a Device you are attempting to Control.  Make a Hacking roll against each ICE at +2.  Any ICE you succeed against are removed from the Device.  Raise the System Alert by 1 for each ICE you fail against.  You cannot stop rolling until all the ICE have been rolled against.

Coming through.description: in one Action, Mark 1 Stress per ICE on a Device you are attempting to Control.  Make a Hacking roll against each ICE at +2.  Any ICE you succeed against are removed from the Device.  Raise the System Alert by 1 for each ICE you fail against.  You cannot stop rolling until all the ICE have been rolled against.
Coming through.name: Coming through
